summary: REQ-26 and REQ-27 appear largely implemented via a new Hero top bar with a creator credit on the left and AuthControls on the right, plus broad styling/spacing/typography consistency changes across multiple sections and shared CSS utilities. However, the diff also introduces unrequested external attribution/linking and Tailwind plugin usage that may violate the “no new dependencies / offline-friendly” constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a Caffeine.ai attribution with an external link (including UTM parameters) in the footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask for any new attribution or outbound marketing link; this is additional user-facing behavior/content.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced Tailwind CSS plugins usage (typography, container-queries, tailwindcss-animate) in Tailwind config.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly disallows introducing external dependencies that reduce offline-friendliness; importing these plugins suggests new dependencies/config beyond requested UI polish.

hallucinated_features.description: Legal/Privacy content now states "We may use anonymous analytics".
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest and potentially conflicts with the stated offline/local-processing positioning (even if only textual).
